trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Get Share ACL</legacyBold> returns information about stored access policies specified on the share.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Get Share ACL</legacyBold> returns information about stored access policies specified on the share.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="52285540-5788-4b38-ac30-f40a68a93dde" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Establishing a Stored Access Policy</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="52285540-5788-4b38-ac30-f40a68a93dde" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Establishing a Stored Access Policy</link>.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold>Get Share ACL</legacyBold> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold>Get Share ACL</legacyBold> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <parameterReference>myaccount</parameterReference> with the name of your storage account:
trans-unit.target: Replace <parameterReference>myaccount</parameterReference> with the name of your storage account:

trans-unit.source: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="2ea86972-4df0-4b87-97fd-3c88910c15e0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for File Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="2ea86972-4df0-4b87-97fd-3c88910c15e0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for File Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes required and optional request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Authentication for the Azure Storage Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dd179428.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Authentication for the Azure Storage Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dd179428.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Authentication for the Azure Storage Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dd179428.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Authentication for the Azure Storage Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dd179428.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Versioning for the Azure Storage Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dd894041.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Versioning for the Azure Storage Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dd894041.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code <legacyBold>200 (OK)</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code <legacyBold>200 (OK)</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <externalLink><linkText>Status and Error Codes</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dd179382.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <externalLink><linkText>Status and Error Codes</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dd179382.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The ETag contains a value that you can use to perform operations conditionally, in quotes.
trans-unit.target: The ETag contains a value that you can use to perform operations conditionally, in quotes.

trans-unit.source: Any operation that modifies the share or its properties or metadata updates the last modified time.
trans-unit.target: Any operation that modifies the share or its properties or metadata updates the last modified time.

trans-unit.source: Operations on files do not affect the last modified time of the share.
trans-unit.target: Operations on files do not affect the last modified time of the share.

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the Blob service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the Blob service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: If a share-level access policy has been specified for the share, <legacyBold>Get Share ACL</legacyBold> returns the signed identifier and access policy in the response body.
trans-unit.target: If a share-level access policy has been specified for the share, <legacyBold>Get Share ACL</legacyBold> returns the signed identifier and access policy in the response body.

trans-unit.source: Only the account owner may call this operation.
trans-unit.target: Only the account owner may call this operation.
